message.name: ERR_CASEATTACHMENT_FV_EMPTY_DESCRIPTION
message.locale: Please enter a description for the Case Attachment.

message.name: ERR_CASEATTACHMENT_FV_BLANK_DESCRIPTION
message.locale: Description cannot contain just an empty line. Please enter a description for the Case Attachment.

message.name: ERR_CASEATTACHMENT_FV_NAME_EMPTY
message.locale: An attachment name must be specified.

message.name: ERR_CASEATTACHMENT_FV_RECEIPTDATE_LATER_THAN_TODAY
message.locale: An attachment receipt date cannot be later than today.

message.name: ERR_CASEATTACHMENT_XRV_FILENAME_LOCATION_REFERENCE
message.locale: Either file location and reference or file attachment must be entered.

message.name: ERR_CASEATTACHMENT_XRV_FILENAME_OR_LOCATION_REFERENCE
message.locale: You should provide either file location and reference or file attachment but not both.

message.name: ERR_CASEATTACHMENT_XRV_EMPTY_FILE
message.locale: You must provide a valid file attachment.

message.name: ERR_CASEATTACHMENT_NAME_XRV_FILE_MUST_EXIST_ALREADY
message.locale: If attachment name is entered, attachment file must exist already.
